thread.title: In Defense of Christendom

author: Bret Stephens
title: In Defense of Christendom
text:
The death of Europe is in sight. Still hazy and not yet inevitable, but nevertheless visible and drawing nearerâ€”like a distant planet in the lens of an approaching satellite. Europe is reaching its end not because of its sclerotic economy, or stagnant demography, or the dysfunctions of the superstate. Nor is the real cause the massive influx of Middle Eastern and African migrants. Those desperate people are just the latest stiff breeze against the timber of a desiccated civilization.
Europe is dying because it has become... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
